input.description:
inputevent: inputevent This is the trap generated by the BladeLogic Operations Manager in response to a job completion.
<trap> <host>172.21.124.100</host> <sysuptime>0</sysuptime> <enterprise>.1.3.6.1.4.1.12788</enterprise> <generic-trap-type>6</generic-trap-type> <specific-trap-type>1001</specific-trap-type> <varbinds> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.12788.1.1.1</oid> <value>dummyComplianceJob_bldemo_1219464000000 @2008/08/22 16:08:07:703-0400</value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.12788.1.1.2</oid> <value>Wed Aug 24 16:31:36 EDT 2008</value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.12788.1.1.3</oid> <value>Wed Aug 24 16:32:10 EDT 2008</value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.12788.1.1.4</oid> <value>0</value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.12788.1.1.5</oid> <value>0</value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.12788.1.1.6</oid> <value>4018123</value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.12788.1.1.7</oid> <value>2038758</value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.12788.1.1.8</oid> <value>30</value> </varbind> </varbinds> </trap>

input.value: Verifying compliance status after remediation job run.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(.)='false'">${status message}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">The given SNMP trap is not a result of compliance remediation job. Cancelling further execution.</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: The given SNMP trap triggered by
is not a result of compliance remediation job. Cancelling further execution.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(.)='failure'">${status message}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">The given SNMP trap is not a result of compliance remediation job. Cancelling further execution.</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: Failed to get change ticket details for change id
Failed to get compliance job name. Recieved following error -

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="contains(., "timeout")"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Timeout has occurred. Please check timeout value in Module Config</xsl:text> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: Incident not closed since remediation attempt failed.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet:
<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:apply-templates select="inconsistent-target/compliance-job-results" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> =========================</xsl:text> </value> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="compliance-job-results"> <xsl:variable name="prev" select=" position()-1" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="$prev=0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Template: </xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="template/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">
+++++++++++++++++++++++++
Rule Group: </xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="rule-group/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:call-template name="display-rule"> <xsl:with-param name="rule" select="." /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="template/text() != /inconsistent-target/compliance-job-results[$prev]/template/text()"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">
=========================
Template: </xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="template/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">
+++++++++++++++++++++++++
Rule Group: </xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="rule-group/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:call-template name="display-rule"> <xsl:with-param name="rule" select="." /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="rule-group/text() != /inconsistent-target/compliance-job-results[$prev]/rule-group/text()"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">
+++++++++++++++++++++++++
Rule Group: </xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="rule-group/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:call-template name="display-rule"> <xsl:with-param name="rule" select="." /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:call-template name="display-rule"> <xsl:with-param name="rule" select="." /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="display-rule"> <xsl:param name="rule" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">
Rule: </xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="$rule/rule/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> - Ref #: </xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="$rule/rule-ref-number/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> - Result: </xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="$rule/result/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> Definition: </xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="$rule/rule-definition/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> Mismatch Conditions: </xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="$rule/mismatch-conditions/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: This workflow is triggered by RBA monitor adapter upon receiving a SNMP alert from BL for a job completion. This workflow checks the BL job status. If the job status is complete, it updates the status of change ticket and task to 'closed'. If violations are not resolved, it escalates the incident.
